title: Morg w soil doing only half the dmg at full magic pen 91:40%
body:
Q and ult does true base dmg as it's stated, but soil only does half dmg of base dmgs min and max even though the tool tip says it should be more.

-Thanks for the awesome feedback, had no idea the soil was procing every half second instead of 1 haha so it does indeed do full true dmg woops.

replies.body: the tooltip show damage/second but it ticks every 0.5 seconds. This is basic knowledge.
Exactly this, it's the same with Fiddlesticks if you test his W, the damage per second is split into 4 hits per second.
It's kinda amazing that something like this could happen, and not the good kind of amazing but that is spaghetti code :(
You don't know what spaghetti code actually looks like, do you?

As far as i know it's when you change something only to have something else that's seemingly unrelated flip out at the same time.

Like the time they gave gnar +10 damage to his Q and he ended up being able to change the direction he was going mid jump or something along those lines. 


But if we are talking actual appearance.....tangled spaghetti?

Pretty much, my statement about changing a thing seemingly unrelated causing another to flip out was kinda on point.

Tangled spaghetti for the code's appearance was kinda obvious but also on point, things being tangled and messy causing weird things to happen to one thing when you change another because they were connected in some way due to odd or poor structuring in the coding. 


Thus it's not weird to assume that changing something seemingly unrelated to morgana's W could have caused a bug with it, due to messy coding since many similar things have happened in the past of league.
It tics every half second... so ya, it will look like it does half damage even though it's doing full damage.
